data.name: 4 Psychological Hotspots of Transformation
data.summary:
Discussion Topics:
Why transformation initiatives can impede change and how COVID-19 affects this
How to narrow the gap between what people understand intellectually and feel emotionally
How to keep people motivated and engaged when they face uncertainty over many months
data.speakers:
Jackie Fenn ,
Distinguished VP Analyst
 
Mary Mesaglio ,
Distinguished VP Analyst
